name: Summoned (Bumblebeegirl)
description:
~Summoned~

"TW" (Contains blood and overall dark themes!!!)

This is the story of a young Necromancer who lost her memories.
Guide her through eerie levels as she makes sacrifices for a being she summoned.
This is to ensure he can physically manifest.

(This is a prototype, and I would like feedback on the gameplay feeling. I would continue this project adding much more story and objects, as well as hidden objects. if the basic gameplay seems fun.)

Controls are (ARROW KEYS) to move and, (R) to restart a level.
(ESCAPE) to exit back to the main menu.
There are 7 test levels included in this prototype.
This also happens to be one of my first attempt at a game that's not a visual novel, so expect bugs,

Credits
Art, Story and Characters was done by me. 
I also had some help with coding from a buddy.
Music by: Jonathan So
